notes: In FY 2015, "Agricultural sciences and natural resources sciences" was split into "Agricultural sciences" and "Natural resources and conservation." Prior to FY 2015, data for "Natural resources and conservation" are included in "Agricultural sciences." For details on field changes in FY 2023, see "Changes in the questionnaire" in the "Technical Notes" section. Data are not collected on planned new construction of research animal space. Details may not add to totals due to rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Science and Engineering Research Facilities.
